plot: First film made by director Divino Tserewahú, a genuine Xavante Indian, in which he thanks his brother for having shown him the world of video recording.
title: Hepari Idubrada, Obrigado Irmão
plot_es: First film made by director Divino Tserewahú, a genuine Xavante Indian, in which he thanks his brother for having shown him the world of video recording.
plot_en: First film made by director Divino Tserewahú, a genuine Xavante Indian, in which he thanks his brother for having shown him the world of video recording.
